root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 14-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development14.b Guarantee access to marine resources and markets for small-scale fishermen14.b.1 Progress made by countries in implementing a legal, regulatory, policy or institutional framework recognizing and protecting the access rights of small-scale fisherscategory IIICategory III
